thread.title: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop
thread.title_full: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop

title: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop
text:
Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop Sixth straight quarter of declines for toy maker’s iconic doll By Cassandra Jaramillo July 16, 2015 4:41 p.m. ET 
Mattel Inc. said Thursday it swung to a loss in its second quarter, though the toy maker posted a surprise profit on an adjusted basis, as sales in the iconic Barbie doll line declined for a sixth-straight quarter. 
The maker of Barbie, Fisher-Price, Hot Wheels and American Girl has tried to improve the strength of its core brands, while cutting expenses in its supply chain. Chief Executive Christopher Sinclair, who took helm in April, has vowed to change the company’s culture. In June, Mr. Sinclair reshuffled duties of...
